name: Crimson Dust
description:
Crimson Dust is a arcade racing game. Choose car, equip gear and weapon, prepare yourself for a fast and furious race.

     Project is currently under development. So in downloadable file you will find some kind of demo version. For now is just few guns, three cars, one track . Please check it out. Maybe you will find it fun and visit this page later.

     In future updates will be implemented:

- Singleplayer campaign.

- Lots of cars and gear.

- Multiplayer via host-client connection(Not sure about dedicated server).

- Mobile vetsion.

     Please leave you comment. Any feedback would be greatly appreciated!
